jsx
Class Code

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Code

public final class Code
extends Disposable

A utility class, with its static methods, providing facilities to create JavaScript code at runtime.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

replaceThisClassName

public static final java.lang.String replaceThisClassName(java.lang.String r,
                                                          java.lang.Object s)

Statically creates code that dynamically performs replacements on the JavaScript this.className objects.

Parameters:
r - The regular expression to perform the replacement.

The newly created JavaScript code.
